did.unittitle: Note from Ezra Fowler, Kent, OH

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A note explaining that the book cover and the title also included in this folder were taken from the home of Honorable Bailie Peyton in Jackson, MS on May 14 1863. This home had been used as a Head Quarters during the war and this was the only thing he ever stole during the war.
